title: Celestial Classics
description: Peaceful largos arranged with soft, celestial sounds capturing the essence of the Old Masters in the spirit of the 'Classical Healing Effect'. The compositions have been arranged at a slow and relaxed tempo of 60 beats per minute, which has a most calming effect on the listener.
details: {"Product Dimensions": "4.88 x 0.39 x 5.67 inches; 3.25 Ounces", "Manufacturer": "Open Sky Music", "Date First Available": "July 27, 2006", "Label": "Open Sky Music", "Country of Origin": "USA", "Number of discs": "1"}
